title: Ticket #6991: Singularity jobs don't set TEMPDIR properly
description: In singularity, we reset the environment variables TMP and TEMP to point to the scratch directory inside the container. Presumably, this is a bind mount, so that writes to tmp won't write to the contained filesystem, and are accounted for in DiskUsage. In vanilla universe we also set TMPDIR to this value, which is the "standard" environment variable, although many older programs use TMP or TEMP. This ticket adds TMPDIR to that list.
